house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1982 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, private spa, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom

house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings,Ceiling Fan(s), Central Vacuum, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Game Room,Garage Door Opener, Gazebo, Intercom System, Microwave, Pantry, TennisCourt(s), Trash Compacter, Wet Bar
